channel.title: Protein Folding on Mauro Faccin
channel.description: Recent content in Protein Folding on Mauro Faccin

item.title: Mapping the Topography of a Protein Energy Landscape
item.description: A new paper from my old PhD work is out. In collaboration with the Itzhaki experimental lab group, we applied our simple model for protein folding (based on WMSE) to the Gankyrin protein. With this approach, both experimental and theoretical, we were able to unveil non trivial folding/unfolding paths.

item.title: Analysis of the Equilibrium and Kinetics of the Ankyrin Repeat Protein Myotrophin
